locations.name: Shanghai
locations.description: A dazzling metropolis blending futuristic skyscrapers with colonial charm, serving as the tour's starting point.

locations.name: Lijiang
locations.description: UNESCO-listed ancient town in Yunnan province, known for its Naxi culture, cobbled streets, and canals.

locations.name: Shangri-La
locations.description: Located near Himalayan foothills in Yunnan, known for Tibetan monasteries, stunning scenery, and profound tranquility.

locations.name: Guilin
locations.description: City famed for its otherworldly karst landscape and serving as a base for exploring the Li River region and nearby Longji Rice Terraces.

locations.name: Hong Kong
locations.description: A dynamic metropolis where East meets West, offering iconic views, vibrant markets, and world-class dining, serving as the tour's culmination point.
